questions.question_text: A while loop continues to execute its block of code as long as what condition is met?

options.A: The loop counter is greater than zero.
options.B: The loop expression evaluates to True.
options.C: The loop expression evaluates to False.
options.D: The break statement is not encountered.

questions.question_text: What is the immediate effect of a continue statement within a loop?

options.B: The current iteration is skipped, and execution jumps to the next iteration's loop expression evaluation.
options.D: The loop restarts from the beginning.

questions.question_text: In a nested loop, which loop controls the number of times the inner loop executes fully?

options.C: Both loops execute an equal number of times.
options.D: The loop with the break statement.

questions.question_text: Under what circumstance will the else block associated with a loop (i.e., loop else) NOT be executed?

options.A: When the loop completes all iterations.
options.B: When a continue statement is executed within the loop.
options.C: When a break statement is executed within the loop.
options.D: The else block will always execute.
